name: Masters of the Universe: The Super Adventure
name_original: Masters of the Universe: The Super Adventure
description: Masters of the Universe: Super Adventure, also known as Masters of the Universe in Terraquake, is a interactive fiction video game developed by Adventure Soft and published by U.S. Gold in 1986. The game is part of the Masters of the Universe media franchise. The game was adapted for the Amstrad CPC, BBC Micro, Commodore 64, and ZX Spectrum home computers.
